alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 9:52PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches through Monday morning. Lake effect snow then develops by Monday afternoon with an additional 2 to locally 4 inches. Storm total snow 8 to 12 inches likely. * WHERE...Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of heaviest snow looks to occur between midnight Sunday night through 9 am Monday morning. Lake effect snow then develops by the afternoon with additional accumulations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
